TDH.JO.summary: Tradehold Limited, an investment holding company, owns, develops, manages, and leases real estate properties. It manages a property portfolio, which includes retail, office, industrial, residential, and leisure properties. The company is also involved in the ownership and development of commercial properties; and provision of treasury services. It operates in the United Kingdom, South Africa, Mozambique, Namibia, Botswana, Zambia, Switzerland, Luxembourg, Malta, and Mauritius. The company is based in San Gwann, Malta.
